entries.title: Sam Bankman-Fried and Allies’ Political Donations Under Scrutiny by U.S.
entries.description: Federal prosecutors appear to be focusing on possible wrongdoing by cryptocurrency executives, rather than by Democratic or Republican politicians. But the inquiries widen an explosive campaign finance scandal.

entries.title: John Fetterman’s TikTok Whisperer
entries.description: Fresh off a frantic election cycle, the former Fetterman campaign social media producer  — and dedicated Swiftie — takes time to shake it off.

entries.title: Restaurateur, Political Donor, Tipster: The Many Roles of FTX’s Ryan Salame
entries.description: The co-chief executive of an FTX unit who told regulators about wrongdoing at the exchange was a big Republican donor. He also bought restaurants.

entries.title: Virtual Reality Pioneer Is Leaving Meta
entries.description: John Carmack, who was chief technology officer of Oculus, which Meta bought, is departing the company.

entries.title: Elon Musk Flexes His Media Muscle by Suspending Reporters on Twitter
entries.description: Elon Musk’s moves this week set off a heated debate about complex issues of free speech and online censorship.
